TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit HijriCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar

summary.span: 代表回曆。

span.span: Represents the Hijri calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 回曆辨識一個紀元： 紀元The Hijri calendar recognizes one era: A.H. (拉丁文"Anno Hegirae"，這表示 「 年的移轉，」 移轉的穆罕默德 (PBUH) 從一提及)。(Latin "Anno Hegirae", which means "the year of the migration," in reference to the migration of Muhammad (PBUH) from Mecca). > [!NOTE] > 如需使用類別和其他的行事曆 .NET Framework 中的類別，請參閱[使用行事曆](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md). 在被 30、 第 2、 5、 7、 第 10、 13、 16、 18、 21、 24 整除一年的結尾是每 30 年週期內，26 和 29 年都是潤年。In every 30-year cycle that ends with a year that is evenly divisible by 30, the 2nd, 5th, 7th, 10th, 13th, 16th, 18th, 21st, 24th, 26th, and 29th years are leap years. 一般年份有 354 天，閏年有 355 天。A common year has 354 days and a leap year has 355 days. 回曆具有 12 個月有 29 到 30 天每個：The Hijri calendar has 12 months with 29 to 30 days each: |GetMonth 值GetMonth value|月份Month|常見的年數天Days in common years|閏年的天數Days in leap years| |--------------------|-----------|--------------------------|------------------------| |11|محرم (Muharram)محرم (Muharram)|3030|3030| |22|صفر (Safar)صفر (Safar)|2929|2929| |33|ربيع الاول (Rabi I)‏ربيع الاول (Rabi I)|3030|3030| |44|ربيع الثاني (Rabi II)‏ربيع الثاني (Rabi II)|2929|2929| |55|جمادى الاولى (Jumada I)جمادى الاولى (Jumada I)|3030|3030| |66|جمادى الثانية (Jumada II)جمادى الثانية (Jumada II)|2929|2929| |77|رجب (Rajab)رجب (Rajab)|3030|3030| |88|شعبان (Shaban)شعبان (Shaban)|2929|2929| |99|رمضان （開幕）رمضان (Ramadan)|3030|3030| |1010|شوال shawwal （月）شوال (Shawwal)|2929|2929| |1111|ذو القعدة (Zulkadah)ذو القعدة (Zulkadah)|3030|3030| |1212|ذو الحجة (Zulhijjah)ذو الحجة (Zulhijjah)|2929|3030| 開幕，齋戒法令來世界月正式開始和結束，取決於新增豬羊變色 」 的觀察。Ramadan, the month of fasting in the Muslim world, officially starts and ends according to a decree that is based on the observation of the new moon. 因此，Shaban 天數和開幕中的天數數目而有所不同。Therefore, the number of days in Shaban and the number of days in Ramadan vary. 日期年 1 月 1，2001 A.D.。The date January 1, 2001 A.D. 在西曆中大約會等於 1421 年紀元 shawwal 月的第六個天in the Gregorian calendar is roughly equivalent to the sixth day of Shawwal in the year 1421 A.H. 回曆。in the Hijri calendar. 這項實作類別以加上或減去的值從零至兩天，以容納在開頭和結尾開幕變異和適應日期之間的差異國家 （地區） 調整的行事曆日期。This implementation of the class adjusts the calendar date by adding or subtracting a value from zero to two days to accommodate the variances in the start and the end of Ramadan and to accommodate the date difference between countries/regions. 值會儲存在屬性。That value is stored in the property. 如果未明確地衍生其值從 控制台 的地區及語言選項 部分中的設定，並儲存在登錄值 HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\International\AddHijriDate 設定。If is not set explicitly, it derives its value from the settings in the regional and language options portion of Control Panel and is stored in the registry value HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\International\AddHijriDate. 不過，該資訊可以變更的生命期限內。However, that information can change during the life of the . 類別不會偵測系統設定中變更自動。The class does not detect changes in the system settings automatically. 每個支援一組的行事曆。Each supports a set of calendars. 屬性會傳回預設的行事曆文化特性，而屬性會傳回陣列，其中包含所有支援的文化特性的行事曆。The property returns the default calendar for the culture, and the property returns an array containing all the calendars supported by the culture. 若要變更所使用的行事曆，應用程式應該設定屬性至新。To change the calendar used by a , the application should set the property of to a new .

Public Overrides Function AddMonths (time As DateTime, months As Integer) As DateTime
public: override DateTime AddMonths(DateTime time, int months);

span.span: The to add months to.
The number of months to add.

summary.span: 傳回與指定 相差指定月數的 。

span.span: Returns a that is the specified number of months away from the specified .

returns.span: ，由將指定的月數加入指定的 所產生。

span.span: The that results from adding the specified number of months to the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的日期部分如果產生的日期不是有效的日期，產生結果年的月份中會受到影響。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它會變更為有效的最後一天，在產生的產生的年份。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 產生的年份部分如果產生的月份超出指定的年份，會影響。The year part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified . 這項實作支援目前的紀元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果產生的年份超出指定紀元，會擲回。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 產生的日期時間部分維持不變，與指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 比方說，如果指定的月份是 Zulkadah，有 30 天，指定一天是該月第 30 天，而`months`參數為 3，產生的年份是其中一個以上的指定年份中，產生的月份是 Safar，並產生 d可能是第 29 天 safar 的最後一天。For example, if the specified month is Zulkadah, which has 30 days, the specified day is the 30th day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 3, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is Safar, and the resulting day is the 29th day, which is the last day in Safar. 如果值`months`參數是負值，產生早於指定。If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 屬性傳回之值一律等於。The property of the returned value always equals . 您可以保留屬性`time`藉由呼叫參數方法，如下列範例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#5)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的數個元件的值方面回曆。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Hijri calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet/CPP/hijricalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet/CS/hijricalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet/VB/hijricalendar_addget.vb#1)]

returns.span: ，由將指定的年數加入指定的 所產生。

span.span: The that results from adding the specified number of years to the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的日期部分如果產生的日期不是有效的日期，產生結果年的月份中會受到影響。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它會變更為有效的最後一天，在產生的產生的年份。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 產生的月份部分維持不變，與指定。The month part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 這項實作支援目前的紀元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果產生的年份超出指定紀元，會擲回。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 產生的日期時間部分維持不變，與指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，Zulhijjah 有 29 天，除了在閏年時為 30 天期間。For example, Zulhijjah has 29 days, except during leap years when it has 30 days. 如果指定的日期，而且 Zulhijjah 閏年中的第 30 天的值`years`為 1，則產生的日期會 Zulhijjah 下列目前年度第 29 天。If the specified date is the 30th day of Zulhijjah in a leap year and the value of `years` is 1, the resulting date will be the 29th day of Zulhijjah in the following year. 如果`years`是負數，產生早於指定。If `years` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 屬性傳回之值一律等於。The property of the returned value always equals . 您可以保留屬性`time`藉由呼叫參數方法，如下列範例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#8)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的數個元件的值方面回曆。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Hijri calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet/CPP/hijricalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet/CS/hijricalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet/VB/hijricalendar_addget.vb#1)]

span.span: The to read.

summary.span: 傳回指定之 中一年中的日期。

span.span: Returns the day of the year in the specified .

returns.span: 從 1 到 355 的整數，表示指定的 中一年中的日期。

span.span: An integer from 1 to 355 that represents the day of the year in the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 年份的日期被定義為一年的第一天中的天數。The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year. 例如，的第一個月的第一天，則傳回 1，和的上個月的最後一天傳回該年度的總天數，這相同的值由。For example, for the first day of the first month returns 1, and for the last day of the last month returns the total number of days in that year, which is the same value returned by . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的數個元件的值方面回曆。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Hijri calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet/CPP/hijricalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet/CS/hijricalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet/VB/hijricalendar_addget.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，這個方法傳回 29 或 30 Zulhijjah (`month` = 12)，取決於是否`year`是否為閏年。For example, this method returns 29 or 30 for Zulhijjah (`month` = 12), depending on whether `year` is a leap year. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會呼叫`GetDaysInMonth`每五年的每個紀元中的第十二個月份。The following code example calls `GetDaysInMonth` for the twelfth month in each of five years in each era. (拉丁文"Anno Hegirae"，這表示 「 年的移轉，」 移轉的穆罕默德 (PBUH) 從一提及)。(Latin "Anno Hegirae", which means "the year of the migration," in reference to the migration of Muhammad (PBUH) from Mecca). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的數個元件的值方面回曆。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Hijri calendar. span.span: A year.
An era.
Specify or .

summary.span: 計算指定年份和紀元的閏月。

span.span: Calculates the leap month for a specified year and era.

returns.span: 一定是 0，因為 型別不支援閏月的概念。

span.span: Always 0 because the type does not support the notion of a leap month.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 曆法，支援閏月的概念，在特定月份或任何一年中月份之後發生的閏月。In a calendar that supports the notion of a leap month, the leap month can occur either after a particular month or after any month in a year. 例如，方法傳回的數字，介於 1 到 13，表示相關聯的指定日期的月份。For example, the method returns a number between 1 and 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果年份的第八個和第九個月之間沒有閏月方法會傳回 8 閏第八個月的 9 和 10 的第九個月份的第八個月份。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.

exception.span: 小於回曆年度 1 年，或大於 9666 年。

span.span: is less than the Hijri calendar year 1 or greater than the year 9666.
-or-
is not or .

MemberSignature.Value: public int HijriAdjustment { get; set; }
.property instance int32 HijriAdjustment
Public Property HijriAdjustment As Integer
public: property int HijriAdjustment { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要在曆法中加減的日數，因應 Ramadan 始末之間的變動和各國家/區域之間的日期差距。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of days to add or subtract from the calendar to accommodate the variances in the start and the end of Ramadan and to accommodate the date difference between countries/regions.

value.span: 從 -2 至 2 的整數，表示要在曆法中加減的日數。

span.span: An integer from -2 to 2 that represents the number of days to add or subtract from the calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項實作類別以加上或減去的值從零至兩天，以容納在開頭和結尾開幕變異和適應日期之間的差異國家 （地區） 調整的行事曆日期。This implementation of the class adjusts the calendar date by adding or subtracting a value from zero to two days to accommodate the variances in the start and the end of Ramadan and to accommodate the date difference between countries/regions. 值會儲存在屬性。That value is stored in the property. 如果未明確地衍生其值從 控制台 的地區及語言選項 部分中的設定，並儲存在登錄值 HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\International\AddHijriDate 設定。If is not set explicitly, it derives its value from the settings in the regional and language options portion of Control Panel and is stored in the registry value HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\International\AddHijriDate. 不過，該資訊可以變更的生命期限內。However, that information can change during the life of the . 類別不會偵測系統設定中變更自動。The class does not detect changes in the system settings automatically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何影響的日期。The following code example shows how affects the date. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar.HijriAdjustment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar.HijriAdjustment/CPP/hijriadjustment.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar.HijriAdjustment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar.HijriAdjustment/CS/hijriadjustment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar.HijriAdjustment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar.HijriAdjustment/VB/hijriadjustment.vb#1)]

span.span: An integer that represents the year.

param.name: month
param.span: 從 1 到 12 的整數，表示月份。

span.span: An integer from 1 to 12 that represents the month.

param.name: day

span.span: An integer from 1 to 30 that represents the day.
An integer that represents the era.

summary.span: 判斷指定的日期是否為閏日。

span.span: Determines whether the specified date is a leap day.

returns.span: 如果指定的日期為閏日，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the specified day is a leap day; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在被 30、 第 2、 5、 7、 第 10、 13、 16、 18、 21、 24 整除一年的結尾是每 30 年週期內，26 和 29 年都是潤年。In every 30-year cycle that ends with a year that is evenly divisible by 30, the 2nd, 5th, 7th, 10th, 13th, 16th, 18th, 21st, 24th, 26th, and 29th years are leap years. 一般年份有 354 天，閏年有 355 天。A common year has 354 days and a leap year has 355 days. 為閏日是閏年只會發生一天。A leap day is a day that occurs only in a leap year. 在回曆，Zulhijjah 第 30 天會是唯一的閏日。In the Hijri calendar, the 30th day of Zulhijjah is the only leap day. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會呼叫`IsLeapDay`五年的每個紀元的第二個月 （二月） 的最後一天的方法。The following code example calls the `IsLeapDay` method for the last day of the second month (February) for five years in each of the eras. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar.IsLeapDay/CPP/hijricalendar_isleapday.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar.IsLeapDay/CS/hijricalendar_isleapday.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar.IsLeapDay/VB/hijricalendar_isleapday.vb#1)]

This method always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在被 30、 第 2、 5、 7、 第 10、 13、 16、 18、 21、 24 整除一年的結尾是每 30 年週期內，26 和 29 年都是潤年。In every 30-year cycle that ends with a year that is evenly divisible by 30, the 2nd, 5th, 7th, 10th, 13th, 16th, 18th, 21st, 24th, 26th, and 29th years are leap years. 一般年份有 354 天，閏年有 355 天。A common year has 354 days and a leap year has 355 days. 為閏月是只發生在閏年整個月。A leap month is an entire month that occurs only in a leap year. 回曆並沒有任何閏月。The Hijri calendar does not have any leap months. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會呼叫`IsLeapMonth`目前紀元中的五年中的所有月份。The following code example calls `IsLeapMonth` for all the months in five years in the current era. summary.span: 取得受此曆法所支援的最晚日期和時間。

span.span: Gets the latest date and time supported by this calendar.

value.span: 最晚的日期和時間所支援類型，這就相當於最後一刻的年 12 月 31 日到 9999 年

span.span: The latest date and time supported by the type, which is equivalent to the last moment of December 31, 9999 C.E.
in the Gregorian calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 西元 9999 年 12 月 31 日December 31, 9999 C.E. 相當於在回曆 9666 年第 4 個月的第 3 天。is equivalent to the 3rd day of the 4th month of the year 9666 in the Hijri calendar. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會取得的最小值和行事曆的最大值。The following code example gets the minimum value and the maximum value of the calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar_MinMax/CPP/hijricalendar_minmax.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar_MinMax/CS/hijricalendar_minmax.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar_MinMax/VB/hijricalendar_minmax.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得此曆法所支援的最早日期和時間。

span.span: Gets the earliest date and time supported by this calendar.

value.span: 最早日期和時間所支援類型，這就相當於 7 月 18，指西元 622年第一個快照

span.span: The earliest date and time supported by the type, which is equivalent to the first moment of July 18, 622 C.E.
in the Gregorian calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft Visual Basic 中表示為所支援的最小日期的指定時間的時間類型，這是公元 0001 年 1 月 1 日Microsoft Visual Basic represents time of day as the specified time on the minimum date supported by the type, which is January 1, 0001 C.E. 不過，類型不支援的最小日期。However, the type does not support that minimum date. 因此，如果您呼叫方法來設定使用現行曆法的日期時間的格式，但您不指定格式規範，格式就會使用 ISO 8601 可排序 ("s") 的日期/時間模式格式規範，而不是預設一般 ("G") 的日期/時間模式格式規範。Consequently, if you call a method to format the time of day using the current calendar but you do not specify a format specifier, formatting uses the ISO 8601 sortable ("s") date/time pattern format specifier instead of the default general ("G") date/time pattern format specifier. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會取得的最小值和行事曆的最大值。The following code example gets the minimum value and the maximum value of the calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar_MinMax/CPP/hijricalendar_minmax.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar_MinMax/CS/hijricalendar_minmax.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar_MinMax/VB/hijricalendar_minmax.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override int ToFourDigitYear (int year);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ToFourDigitYear(int32 year) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToFourDigitYear (year As Integer) As Integer
public: override int ToFourDigitYear(int year);

param.name: year
param.span: 兩位數或四位數整數，代表要轉換的年份。

span.span: A two-digit or four-digit integer that represents the year to convert.

summary.span: 將指定的年份轉換為 4 位數年份，方法是使用 屬性以判斷適當的世紀。

span.span: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year by using the property to determine the appropriate century.

returns.span: 整數，包含 的四位數表示。

span.span: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是以兩位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍中的最後一年。 is the last year in the 100-year range that can be represented by a two-digit year. 世紀所找到的兩位數的唯一項目決定`year`該 100 年範圍內。The century is determined by finding the sole occurrence of the two-digit `year` within that 100-year range. 例如，如果設為 1429，100 年範圍是從 1330年到 1429年; 因此，30 的 2 位數值會解譯為 1330，而 2 位數為 29 值解譯為 1429年。For example, if is set to 1429, the 100-year range is from 1330 to 1429; therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1330, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 1429. 支援兩位數年份或四位數年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 傳遞的兩位數年份值 (小於 100) 將使這個方法將值轉換為四位數的值根據值，表示該適當世紀。Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果應用程式提供支援的行事曆範圍內的四位數年份值，方法會傳回實際的輸入的值。If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to , the method returns the actual input value. 如果應用程式提供支援的行事曆範圍四位數值或它提供一個負數值，方法會擲回例外狀況。If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.

exception.span: 在這個日曆所支援的範圍之外。

span.span: is outside the range supported by this calendar.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int TwoDigitYearMax { get; set; }
.property instance int32 TwoDigitYearMax
Public Overrides Property TwoDigitYearMax As Integer
public: virtual property int TwoDigitYearMax { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

span.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

value.span: 以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性允許 2 位數的年份的 4 位數年份正確轉譯。This property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year. 例如，這個屬性設定為 1429年，100 年範圍是從 1330年 1429年到。For example, if this property is set to 1429, the 100-year range is from 1330 to 1429. 因此，30 的 2 位數值會解譯為 1330，而 2 位數為 29 值解譯為 1429年。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1330, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 1429. 這個屬性的起始值被衍生自 控制台 的地區及語言選項 部分中的設定。The initial value of this property is derived from the settings in the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 不過，該資訊可以變更的生命期限內。However, that information can change during the life of the . 類別不會偵測系統設定中變更自動。The class does not detect changes in the system settings automatically. 應用程式應將此值為 99，表示就其字面 2 位數的年份。The application should set this value to 99 to indicate that 2-digit years are to be taken literally. 例如，這個屬性設定為 99，100 年範圍是從 0 （不是有效值大部分的行事曆） 到 99。For example, if this property is set to 99, the 100-year range is from 0 (not a valid value for most calendars) to 99. 因此，30 的 2 位數值會解譯為 30。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 30.

span.span: This calendar is read-only.

exception.span: 設定作業中的值小於 100 或大於 9666。

span.span: The value in a set operation is less than 100 or greater than 9666.
